name: create-nuxt-base
description: Starter to generate a configured environment with VueJS, Nuxt, Tailwind, Linting, Unit Tests, Playwright etc.
author: lenne.Tech GmbH

scripts.check: pnpm audit && pnpm run format:check && cd nuxt-base-template && pnpm run check
scripts.check:fix: pnpm install && pnpm audit --fix && pnpm run format && cd nuxt-base-template && pnpm run check:fix
scripts.check:naf: pnpm install && pnpm run format && cd nuxt-base-template && pnpm run check:naf
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin main
